price: 39. Il a été autorisé à ceux qui sont combattus (de se défendre), pour avoir été lésés. Allah est Infiniment Capable de les faire triompher,
arabic: أُذِنَ لِلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتَلُونَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ ظُلِمُواْۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ نَصۡرِهِمۡ لَقَدِيرٌ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: udhina lilladhīna yuqātalūna bi-annahum ẓulimū wa-inna al-laha ʿalā naṣrihim laqadīrun
